sentences: Muretse metsast mastipuud, tee valmis ja aja üles.
Koer luusis metsa all ning ajas jäneseid üles.
Sain just magama jääda, kui telefon, uksekell ajas üles.
context: The word 'muretse' is the present indicative connegative form of the Estonian verb 'muretsema'. It means to raise, lift up, or cause something to rise. This can refer physically lifting objects (like wood), causing animals/people to stand up or wake up, or things growing/rising naturally like fog or clouds. The word appears in contexts where something is being elevated from a lower position to a higher one.
